name: ACTON III BLACK
description: This new generation of the home line-up has an even wider soundstage than its predecessor, re-engineered for a more immersive experience. This new generation has tweeters angled outwards and updated waveguides to deliver a consistently solid sound that is so wide it chases you around the room.

name: ACTON III CREAM
description: This new generation of the home line-up has an even wider soundstage than its predecessor, re-engineered for a more immersive experience. This new generation has tweeters angled outwards and updated waveguides to deliver a consistently solid sound that is so wide it chases you around the room.

name: STANMORE III BLACK
description: The Marshall STANMORE III has a 50W class D amp for woofers and 2 x 15W class D amps for tweeters. This offers a powerful low-frequency response, but don't expect a pumping bass. Midrange was decent for natural and detailed vocals and instruments, but it offers clear and crisp highs.

name: STANMORE III CREAM
description: The Marshall STANMORE III has a 50W class D amp for woofers and 2 x 15W class D amps for tweeters. This offers a powerful low-frequency response, but don't expect a pumping bass. Midrange was decent for natural and detailed vocals and instruments, but it offers clear and crisp highs.

name: WOBURN III CREAM
description: HOME-SHAKING SOUND - Woburn III has an even wider soundstage than its predecessor and fills any space with immersive, home-shaking Marshall signature sound. Woburn III has been re-engineered with a new three-way driver system, which delivers more controlled, lower-frequency bass and greater clarity in the midrange.

name: WOBURN III BLACK
description: HOME-SHAKING SOUND - Woburn III has an even wider soundstage than its predecessor and fills any space with immersive, home-shaking Marshall signature sound. Woburn III has been re-engineered with a new three-way driver system, which delivers more controlled, lower-frequency bass and greater clarity in the midrange.

name: MIDDLETON BLACK AND BRASS
description: Marshall engineers use a combination of modern and vintage technologies to achieve their distinctive sound through a combination of high-quality components, including specially designed speakers, custom-built cabinets, and unique circuitry

name: MIDDLETON CREAM
description: Marshall engineers use a combination of modern and vintage technologies to achieve their distinctive sound through a combination of high-quality components, including specially designed speakers, custom-built cabinets, and unique circuitry

name: EMBERTON II BLACK AND BRASS
description: Emberton II offers 30+ hours of portable playtime on a single charge. Its compact size, rugged durability and reliable playtime, make it perfect to take with you. When you're out of battery, Emberton II won't keep you waiting long – plug in your speaker and return to full battery in 3 hours.
